dt-option.name: columns.searchPanes.className
dt-option.summary: Add a custom class name to a pane

type.description: Adds a custom class to the specified pane based on this string.

dt-option.default: The default value for the `-init searchPanes.className` option is `-type undefined` as the standard should be without any custom classes.
dt-option.description:
By setting a class name, specific panes can be targetted for custom styling.
Custom Panes can have custom classes applied in a similar way to how `-init columns.searchPanes.dtOpts` are applied to panes. You can declare the `-init columns.searchPanes.className` option within an object of the `dt-init columnDefs` array - this will apply the custom class to that pane.
